guest_info.name: Bari Mill
guest_info.title: Real Estate Agent
guest_info.company: Dawn McKenna Group, Coldwell Banker Realty

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Dealing with rejection when clients choose other agents
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Focus on the next opportunity and don't dwell on lost business.

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Building a client base from scratch
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Leverage personal and spouse's network, focus on niche markets like finance.
Set small daily goals to input client data regularly.

target_avatars.relevance: Bari's journey from starting in real estate to becoming a top producer in six years.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Focus on building a strong network and leveraging existing relationships.

target_avatars.relevance: Advice on managing early career challenges and focusing on growth.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Don't take rejections personally and always look for new opportunities.

clip_worthy_moments.quote: Focus on what you do have, not on what you don't.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: Encourages agents to maintain a positive outlook despite setbacks.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Feeling down about lost deals? Here's a mindset shift that can help.

clip_worthy_moments.quote: Find a niche and leverage your network.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: Provides a clear strategy for new agents to build their business.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Struggling to find clients? Here's a strategy that worked wonders for Bari Mill.

key_tactics.tactic: Leverage your spouse's network for business opportunities.
key_tactics.context: Especially useful if your spouse works in a high-income industry.

key_tactics.tactic: Host client events and encourage them to bring friends.
key_tactics.context: Use events as a way to expand your network and meet potential clients.

quotable_insights: You're lucky to be stressed because that means you have business.
The harder you work, the more money you can make.

resources_mentioned.name: Real Geeks
resources_mentioned.context: For lead conversion and CRM management.

resources_mentioned.name: courted.io
resources_mentioned.context: For recruiting and retention using AI.

episode_summary: In this episode, Bari Mill shares her journey from teaching to becoming a top real estate producer in Chicago. She discusses the importance of mindset, leveraging personal networks, and finding a niche market. Bari also highlights the significance of maintaining a positive attitude and the benefits of hosting client events to expand one's business.
